basics.name: Diijon Taylor
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Professional Web Developer, Programmer, Database Analyst, and Graphic Designer that specializes in blending powerful web solutions and data exchange with quality layout and design. I have more than ten years of experience working with web technologies.
